concept.title: DITA Complex Lists
concept.shortdesc: This topic descrobes definition lists and parameter lists.

conbody.p: The two complex list types can be rendered as tables or as lists. Here the definition list is rendered as a table, and the parameter list as a list.

section.title: Definition Lists
section.p: Definition lists consist of a series of terms and their descriptions. Each item may have one or more terms, followed by one or more descriptions. The list has an optional head.

section.title: Parameter Lists
section.p: Parameter lists are similar to definition lists, and are in fact derived from them. However, they cannot have headings.
